Three swimmers rescued from Kawerau River, Queenstown by police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Three-swimmers-rescued-from-kawerau-river-queenstown-by-police/AOHRUPQP35H5TMOCTAE7XDLTOQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Three-swimmers-rescued-from-kawerau-river-queenstown-by-police/AOHRUPQP35H5TMOCTAE7XDLTOQ/ They entered the river and were immediately caught in danger. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:36:17 +0000 Three men had to be rescued by police after being caught in trouble in Kawarau River, Queenstown.
New Year Honours 2024: Dr Megan Balks recognised for services to Antarctic soil science https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-year-honours-2024-dr-megan-balks-recognised-for-services-to-antarctic-soil-science/YYB5OI7YLRD6VNAJMYWIUBWSNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-year-honours-2024-dr-megan-balks-recognised-for-services-to-antarctic-soil-science/YYB5OI7YLRD6VNAJMYWIUBWSNY/ Dean TaylorDr Megan Balks is the latest recipient of the New Zealand Antarctic Medal. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:29:26 +0000 Megan Balks sampling soil, with “supervision” from a curious penguin, at Cape Hallett, Antarctica. Photo / Jackie Aislabie
Summer sharks: Bronze whaler spotted only 20m from people on Pāpāmoa Beach in Tauranga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-sharks-bronze-whaler-spotted-only-20m-from-people-on-papamoa-beach-in-tauranga/X2EGLOLHRZFVHMWY3DR3GTTA7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-sharks-bronze-whaler-spotted-only-20m-from-people-on-papamoa-beach-in-tauranga/X2EGLOLHRZFVHMWY3DR3GTTA7U/ Experts say these sighting are common this time of year. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:18:38 +0000 People walking along the beach at Papamoa Beach showing how close sharks are daily. Photo / Scott East
Te Pāti Māori protests, Taupō Starbucks and Hobbiton: the big stories of December 2023 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-pati-maori-protests-taupo-starbucks-and-hobbiton-the-big-stories-of-december-2023/HD5CNSR2XZHR7PRYHRAFJLBARA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-pati-maori-protests-taupo-starbucks-and-hobbiton-the-big-stories-of-december-2023/HD5CNSR2XZHR7PRYHRAFJLBARA/ Danielle ZollickhoferAs the year draws to a close, Waikato Herald is taking stock of 2023. Kaimai crash kills Whakatāne couple, 4-year-old son survives https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kaimai-crash-kills-whakatane- Couple-4-year-old-son-survives/Z54JCQPK5BGGLL4Y5RQR3ZW6XE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kaimai-crash-kills-whakatane- Couple-4-year-old-son-survives/Z54JCQPK5BGGLL4Y5RQR3ZW6XE/ Megan Wilson'It’s going to hurt him for a long time ... for two young lives to be taken so tragically' Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:38:27 +0000 Josephine Wilson and Piripi Chase were killed in a crash on the Kaimai Range on December 28.
Northland Brynderwyns state highway closure will cost everyone, truck driver warns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-brynderwyns-state-highway-closure-will-cost-everyone-truck-driver-warns/VJ43KKV3RBD7THEZSYCMPKGU3Q/ Denise PiperThe extra costs for taking the detour will have to be passed on, truck drivers say. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The closure of State Highway 1 at Brynderwyn Hills will cost about $200 each truck trip, logging truck driver Grant Caldwell says, with costs being passed on to consumers. Photo / Michael Cunningham
